_check_in_separate_process('check_main_thread_id_simple',
    '_pydevd_test_find_main_thread_id')
_check_in_separate_process('check_main_thread_id_multiple_threads',
    '_pydevd_test_find_main_thread_id')
_check_in_separate_process('check_win_threads',
    '_pydevd_test_find_main_thread_id')
_check_in_separate_process('check_fix_main_thread_id_multiple_threads',
    '_pydevd_test_find_main_thread_id')
import subprocess
import pydevd
cwd, environ = _build_launch_env()
subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, '-m',
    '_pydevd_test_find_main_thread_id'], env=environ, cwd=cwd)
resources_dir = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(pydevd.__file__),
    'tests_python', 'resources')
subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, os.path.join(resources_dir,
    '_pydevd_test_find_main_thread_id.py')], env=environ, cwd=cwd)
pytest.mark.skipif(not IS_CPYTHON or IS_PY39_OR_GREATER, reason=
    'Functionality to trace other threads requires CPython.3.9: still needs support to tracing other threads (waiting for CPython api to stabilize)'
    )
